hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Twinrova# holds...^ #the Bolero of Fire# and #a Red Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: Expired Spoiler Log? Don't worry! The OoTR Discord staff can help you out.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Nocturne of Shadow#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Big Poe Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block First Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Having trouble breathing underwater?^Have you tried wearing more BLUE?

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Compass# and #Deku Nut Capacity#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Green Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Compass#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple MQ Chest On Fire

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Right Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Map Chest
